document_data.name: Ticklebelly Hills
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ticklebelly Hills''' was a grouping of rocky hills and cliffs found in the [[Moonsea North]] region of [[North Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: The Ticklebelly Hills comprised rocky mounds, large crags and sparse vegetation.{{Cite adventurers league/Pool of Radiance Resurgent|12}} The landscape was relatively difficult to traverse, at least for [[humanoid]] travelers.{{Cite adventurers league/Pool of Radiance Resurgent|11}}

Geography.Flora & Fauna: [[Bulette]]s were known to dig their tunnels beneath the earth of the Ticklebelly Hills.

document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1489}}, a [[shooting star]] fell from the skies into the hills, causing unease among the local wildlife and forming a [[Kranun's Crater|massive crater]].{{Cite adventurers league/Pool of Radiance Resurgent|5}}
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Kranun's Crater]], home to the exiled [[stone giant]] [[Kranun]] and the [[pool of radiance]] that formed within.{{Cite adventurers league/Pool of Radiance Resurgent|9}}
